name: Calculated hours IS Plan Drawings
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(IS Plan Drawings:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Implementation_Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval(((14 * (<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Overall_Site_Plans_(0-20))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Enlarged_Site_Plans_(0-100))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Building_Plans_(0-100))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Room_Plans_(0-100))*>)) + (<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Reviews_(add_Asbuilts)_(2-5))*> * (<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Overall_Site_Plans_(0-20))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Enlarged_Site_Plans_(0-100))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Building_Plans_(0-100))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Room_Plans_(0-100))*>) * 0.25))) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Implementation_Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(IS_GES_Location.None)*>)){<* Eval((((14 * (<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Overall_Site_Plans_(0-20))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Enlarged_Site_Plans_(0-100))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Building_Plans_(0-100))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Room_Plans_(0-100))*>)) + (<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Reviews_(add_Asbuilts)_(2-5))*> * (<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Overall_Site_Plans_(0-20))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Enlarged_Site_Plans_(0-100))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Building_Plans_(0-100))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Room_Plans_(0-100))*>) * 0.25)))) *>}{<* Eval(((((14 * (<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Overall_Site_Plans_(0-20))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Enlarged_Site_Plans_(0-100))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Building_Plans_(0-100))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Room_Plans_(0-100))*>)) + (<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Reviews_(add_Asbuilts)_(2-5))*> * (<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Overall_Site_Plans_(0-20))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Enlarged_Site_Plans_(0-100))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Building_Plans_(0-100))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Room_Plans_(0-100))*>) * 0.25)))) *1.1) *>}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
